comments.html: If you still want to play a game or two once in a while try sudoku. There are a few really good ones out there. I sugges sudoku because they’re a little bit more demanding. I’ve noticed that after three or four games I get tired and leave it unlike match-tree type games. It’s still enjoyable and rewarding but uch easier to quit and doesn’t take that much time.
I'm so glad you posted this. Seeing someone else struggle with their phone feels validating. I've had to ban infinite scroll microblogging apps for the same reason.
